instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Need help identifying 12" Retina board
threads.message:
I got this machine that had liquid damage and isn't turning on anymore. I have a spare 820-00045 board that I can take parts from if need be. 
I searched the serial number of the macbook and it shows that is also an A1534(EMC 2746)
Serial #: C02QK7XYGF84

For some reason though it doesn't have the same layout as the other boardview I have and the board view doesn't match. I can see some caps that don't look great but aren't shorted so I want to replace them and hopefully fix this. 
I can't find a board number written on neither of these boards. If these do have a different schem/boardview could someone send this to me.
Here are images of the board so someone may be able to identify it.

threads.title: Need help identifying 12" Retina board
threads.message:
You are right I found a picture from ifixit and this looks like the 820-00244 board.

Could someone please send me a schematic/boardview if possible?
